A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can go on a whole speech on how it doesn't follow a logical plot\, how they use real world humor in a setting that takes you out of the fantasy\, and how it doesn't follow the pre-introduced \"rules\" of the Star Wars Universe and several characters are ultimately unnecessary.\n\nBut\, in the end..the movie is actually pretty decent as a movie\, but terrible as a Star War movie. If you plan of watching it don't go in expecting a Star Wars space opera...expect watching a fun popcorn movie that has no bearing.
